text: Nafesha Veronica Richardson is the founder of Spark SVG. She is a youth rights defender from St Vincent and the Grenadines. She is a member of the Commonwealth Youth Gender and Equality Network (CYGEN), a Youth Champion of the Escaz√∫ Agreement. She is also a volunteer at the St Vincent and the Grenadines Girl Guides Association. == Activism and Works == At the age of 7, Nafesha Richardson joined the St. Vincent and the Grenadines Girl Guides Association willingly to learn and fight for the social and domestic issues. Those issues were affecting the people of St Vincent and the Grenadines. Those issues are mostly domestic and sexual violences. In May 2019, at the age of 22, Nafesha founded the "Spark St Vincent and the Grenadines" (Spark SVG). With this, she aimed to inspire, empower and motivate young people in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines to improve positive changes in the society. She attended Commonwealth Banquet in the year 2020. She attended "Youth4Climate: Driving Ambition" held in Milan, Italy. In the event, she was a representative from St Vincent and the Grenadines on the 28th-30th of September 2021. It was a Pre-COP event organized by Ministry of Ecological Transition, Connect4Climate and Office of Secretary-General's Envoy on Youth, launched on June 2020. Presently, she is an active ambassador for "One Young World". == References == Category:Living people Category:Human rights activists Category:Climate activists Category:1996 births
